item.description:
We've rescheduled this month to the second Thursday.

A group member has commented:

I'd like to offer up a discussion point, if I may. "How Agile
are you?". I'd be interested to hear peoples' thoughts and
reasonings.


The discussion can of course wander off in many directions, but this sounds like an excellent starting point.
item.how_to_find_us: Photos of some members are on meetup and at http://xtcboston.blogspot.com
item.name: eXtreme Thursday Club - Boston April Meetup
